tgt_original: svahṛdīndau vajravaraṭakamadhyasthaṃ  hūṃkāreṇa cittavajraṃ dhyāyād ity arthaḥ | ( 54 )  vadanaśirasā yathākramaṃ ye kamalacakre
tasya nābhau madhyabhāge āḥkāreṇa vāgvajraṃ |  praṇava oṃkāras tena kāyavajraṃ dhyāyād iti
sambandhaḥ  teṣāṃ cittavajrādīnāṃ hṛdayāni teṣāṃ | raśmi  iha hi taddhṛdayeṣu
candrasthavajrapadmacakrasthā  yathākramaṃ hūṃ āḥ oṃkārā draṣṭavyāḥ | teṣāṃ
bāhyaiś ca sa [ r ] vagandhādyai [ r ]  jinendrān maṇḍalacakrāntargatān | oṃ  sarvatathāgata [ pūjā ] vajrasvabhāvātmako'ham | ity evaṃ
